data.eml:eml: Studies on the genus Aeolothrips (Thysanoptera: Aeolothripidae) in Iran, with a key to species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Alavi, Jalil, Minaei, Kambiz (2018): Studies on the genus Aeolothrips (Thysanoptera: Aeolothripidae) in Iran, with a key to species. Zootaxa 4446 (3): 343-360, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4446.3.3
